#summary The full grammar for our language
_Refer to Appendix A13 of K&R. I'm trying to follow their example while removing the stuff we are not implementing.
Check out http://java.sun.com/docs/books/jls/second_edition/html/grammars.doc.html for an explanation of the 'opt' subscript._

<wiki:toc>

=program=
{{{
program : statement-list
        ;

statement-list : statement
               | statement-list statement
               ;

statement : expression-statement
          | if-statement
          | iteration-statement
          | jump-statement
          | function-definition
          | sim-function-definition
          | declaration
          ;
}}}
